data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If your facing forward you would assume that the path is straight ahead. If you are facing backwards the road would be curved. If you are facing forward you would think that heading left would be the best direction to take. So, the answer is no.
